articles.author: AFP
articles.title: EU Eyes Special Court to Try Russia for Ukraine War - The Moscow Times
articles.description: European Union chief Ursula von der Leyen on Wednesday floated the idea of a "specialized court" to put Russia's top officials on trial over the war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
European Union chief Ursula von der Leyen on Wednesday floated the idea of a "specialized court" to put Russia's top officials on trial over the war in Ukraine.
